messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Get to shelter and hide from the mother, may God be with you all.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Ork Base in Space 453. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Ork Base in Space 453. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mech Bay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Haha lol faggots i win get rekt scruksbs
